name: image-js
description: Image processing and manipulation in JavaScript
author: MichaÃ«l Zasso

scripts.build-dist: browserify src/index.js -o dist/image.js --standalone IJS --exclude canvas --ignore buffer --ignore zlib --ignore fs --global-transform [ babelify ]
scripts.publish-doc: npm run build-doc && git add doc && git commit -m 'doc: rebuild doc' && git push origin master && git subtree push --prefix doc origin gh-pages
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run clean-dist && npm run build-dist
scripts.build-test: browserify test/browser/bootstrap.js -o test/browser/image.js --standalone IJS --exclude canvas --ignore buffer --ignore zlib --ignore fs --debug --global-transform [ babelify --sourceMap ]
scripts.compile: npm run clean-lib && babel src --out-dir lib
scripts.test: sh test/checkOnly.sh && npm run test-mocha && npm run eslint
scripts.test-cov: node -r ./test/node/babel node_modules/.bin/babel-istanbul cover _mocha -- --require should --reporter dot --recursive test/node
scripts.test-travis: sh test/checkOnly.sh && node -r ./test/node/babel node_modules/.bin/babel-istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- --require should --reporter mocha-better-spec-reporter --recursive test/node && npm run eslint
scripts.watch-browser: watchify test/browser/bootstrap.js -o test/browser/image.js --standalone IJS --exclude canvas --ignore buffer --ignore zlib --ignore fs --debug --global-transform [ babelify --sourceMap ]
